subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: The two-time Tour de France winner Alberto Contador said he was planning to retire in 2016. Contador, 32, plans to ride in the Giro d’Italia and the Tour this year.
snippet: The two-time Tour de France winner Alberto Contador said he was planning to retire in 2016. Contador, 32, plans to ride in the Giro d’Italia and the Tour this year.
